title: Hong Kong's Drive For Open Elections Runs Low On Steam
teaser: Earlier this week, China insisted that the people of Hong Kong would not be allowed to nominate candidates for the territory's next leader. Occupy Central, a local democracy movement, is threatening to shut down the city's financial district in protest â€” but organizers acknowledge that only 3,000 people have signed pledges to participate.
